full_text: CATHOLIC MIGRATION AND REFUGEE OFFICE DIOCESE OF BROOKLYN 243 PROSPECT PARK WEST BROOKLYN, N.Y. 11215 718-768-6888 March 13, 1987. Immigration & Naturalization Service 26 Federal Plaza New York, N. Y. 01278 RE: REV. DELOUIS, Ferdinand E. Section 101 (a) (27) (c) (1) Gentlemen: REV. DELOUIS is eligible for Adjustment of Status pursuant to Section 101 (a) (27) (c) (1) of the INS Act. On his behalf, we are submitting herewith the following: 1. Form I-485 2. Form G-28 3. Form G-325A 4. Form FD-258 5. 2 Color photographs 6. Certified Copy and Translation of Ben.'s Birth Cert. 7. Letter from the Diocese of Brooklyn regarding his Ordination as a Priest. 8. Letter from the Parish, Ss. Joachim & Ann Church 9. Letter of Support from the Diocese of Brooklyn 10. $50.00 dollars Money Order (Filing Fee) We request that REV. DELOUIS be granted Work Authorization while his application is pending. His services are needed imme- diately. Thanking you, in advance, for your cooperation in this matter, I remain, Sincerely, CATHOLIC MIGRATION OFFICE BY: Concern Guzor CARMEN GONZALEZ IMMIGRATION COUNSELOR Encs. ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICE: 75 GREENE AVENUE, P.O. BOX "C" - BROOKLYN, N.Y. 11202
